attributes.action: Address the problem of Saudi Arabia exporting its radical version of Islam.
attributes.background: Saudi Arabia has continually financed and exported its radical and perverted version of Islam, also known as Wahhabism, globally. We must pressure the Saudi establishment to stop exporting radical literature for the purpose of proselytising vulnerable poverty-stricken Muslims into radicals.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
